授業目的: This is an introductory lecture to the basics of accounting.  The objective of this course is to familiarize students with accounting and financial reporting concepts so they may understand their application and meaning in business.
到達目標:
While undertaking this course, students will learn common frameworks for conducting accounting activities, become familiar with the structure of financial statements and practice making appropriate adjustments in order to reconcile basic business entries and activities.

Specifically, students will...
1. Define accounting and bookkeeping.
2. Explore common accounting rules and practices in business
3. Apply accounting rules to adjust financial information
4. Prepare financial statements
5. Utilize the course content to successfully record practical entries for a business
